mms.controller.interfaces

Interface IAbstractController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractController, AdminFilmController, AdminStatsController, CreditsController, CustomerStatsController, DetailsFilmController, EditableCardController, EditableDiscountController, EditableFilmController, EditablePersonController, EditableReviewController, EditableShopController, FavoriteFilmController, FeedbackController, FilmListController, LoginController, ManageCopyFilmController, ManageCustomerController, ManageShopController, ManageSocietyController, MenuController, ReviewController, SocietyFilmController

    public interface IAbstractController
    Interface that defines the AbstractController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

      • changeView

        void changeView(java.lang.Integer fromView,
              java.lang.Integer toView,
              java.lang.Object item)
        This method has the function to change the current view when requested.
        Parameters:
        fromView - this parameter defines the current view.
        toView - this parameter defines the view that we want to go.
        item - this parameter passes the items of the view.
